name: Ronald Bert SMITH, Jr., applicant, v. ALABAMA.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Ronald Bert SMITH, Jr., applicant,
v.
ALABAMA.
attorneys: Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied. The order heretofore entered by Justice THOMAS is vacated.
Justice GINSBERG, Justice BREYER, Justice SOTOMAYOR, and Justice KAGAN would grant the application for stay of execution.
casebody.head_matter:
Ronald Bert SMITH, Jr., applicant,
v.
ALABAMA.
No. 16-7070 (16A545).
Supreme Court of the United States
Dec. 8, 2016.
Application for stay of execution of sentence of death presented to Justice THOMAS and by him referred to the Court denied. The order heretofore entered by Justice THOMAS is vacated.
Justice GINSBERG, Justice BREYER, Justice SOTOMAYOR, and Justice KAGAN would grant the application for stay of execution.
